title: Firework
lyrics:
[intro] (G)
(G) Do you ever feel… (Am) like a plastic bag
(Em) Drifting through the wind… (C) wanting to start again
(G) Do you ever feel… (Am) feel so paper thin 
(Em) Like a house of cards… (C) one blow from caving in
 
(G) Do you ever feel… (Am) already buried deep
(Em) Six feet under scream but (C)no one seems to hear a thing
(G) Do you know that there's… (Am) still a chance for you
(Em) Cause there's a spark in you (C) you just gotta
 
[pre-chorus] 
Ig(G)nite… the (Am)light
And (Em)let… it (C)shine
Just (G)own… the (Am)night
Like the (Em)Fourth of Ju(C)ly
 
[chorus]
‘Cause baby you're a (G)fi-i-ire(Am)work
Come on show 'em (Em)wha-a-at your (C)worth
Make 'em go (G)"Ah, ah, ah!"
(Am) As you shoot across the (Em)sky-y-(C)y
Baby you're a (G)fi-i-ire(Am)work
Come on let your (Em)co-o-olours (C)burst
Make 'em go (G)"Ah, ah, ah!"
(Am) You're gonna leave 'em all in (Em)awe, awe (C)awe
 
(G) You don't have to feel… (Am) like a waste of space
(Em) You're original… (C) cannot be replaced
(G) If you only knew… (Am) what the future holds
(Em) After a hurricane… (C) comes a rainbow
 
(G) Maybe you're reason why… (Am) all the doors are closed
(Em) So you can open one that (C)leads you to the perfect road
(G) Like a lightning bolt… (Am) your heart will glow
(Em) And when it's time you'll know (C) you just gotta
 
[pre-chorus] 
Ig(G)nite… the (Am)light
And (Em)let… it (C)shine
Just (G)own… the (Am)night
Like the (Em)Fourth of Ju(C)ly
 
[chorus]
‘Cause baby you're a (G)fi-i-ire(Am)work
Come on show 'em (Em)wha-a-at your (C)worth
Make 'em go (G)"Ah, ah, ah!"
(Am) As you shoot across the (Em)sky-y-(C)y
Baby you're a (G)fi-i-ire(Am)work
Come on let your (Em)co-o-olours (C)burst
Make 'em go (G)"Ah, ah, ah!"
(Am) You're gonna leave 'em all in (Em)awe, awe (C)awe
 
(Em)Boom, boom, boom… even brighter than the 
(C)Moon, moon, moon… it's always been inside of 
(G)You, you, you… and now it's time to let it 
(D)Thro-o-ough
 
[chorus, single strum]
‘Cause baby you're a (G)fi-i-ire(Am)work
Come on show 'em (Em)wha-a-at your (C)worth
Make 'em go (G)"Ah, ah, ah!"
(Am) As you shoot across the (Em)sky-y-(C)y
[normal strum]
Baby you're a (G)fi-i-ire(Am)work
Come on let your (Em)co-o-olours (C)burst
Make 'em go (G)"Ah, ah, ah!"
(Am) You're gonna leave 'em all in (Em)awe, awe (C)awe
 
(Em)Boom, boom, boom… even brighter than the 
(C)Moon, moon, moon…
(Em)Boom, boom, boom… even brighter than the 
(C)Moon, moon, moon… (C-ring) [end]
